title: i can not connect after used this thing

embed.description: TL;DR - We have a short-term work around for the client disconnects, but are still looking for a permanent solution. Hey Summoners, For the last few days, we’ve heard a lot of your reports about disconnecting from the LoL Client.

body: i can play the game few days ago ,but stared yesterday,i cant connect the server.hope some one can help me fix this problem.

replies.body:
Issues connecting to the server are often caused by network settings that prevent a connection from happening. I strongly recommend working through the steps in our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a next step in finding a permanent solution.

Let me know if those steps resolved this.
